sources.title: Circle Canyon (1933) BUDDY ROOSEVELT
sources.description:
Starring: Buddy Roosevelt, June Mathews, Clarissa Woods
Directed by: Denver Dixon

Two opposing gangs attempt to wrest control of valuable Oklahoma oil lands from an orphaned girl, who only has an adopted father to aid her.

TRIVIA: A year after this film's release it was remade starring John Wayne as â€˜NEATH ARIZONA SKIES by Lone Star Productions.

metadata.Plot: Lone Star Productions did an exact remake of this one year later (line for line), with John Wayne, changing only the name of the lead character. The simplified plot has two different gangs attempting to wrest control of valuable Oklahoma oil lands from an orphaned girl,Lucy Morrell (Clarissa Woods) who is aided in her fight by her adopted father Chris Morrell (Buddy Roosevelt).
metadata.Actors: Buddy Roosevelt, June Mathews, Clarissa Woods
